investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of 200% of the daily performance of AAPL.
principal_strategies: Under normal circumstances, the Fund invests at least 80% of its net assets (plus borrowings) in the securities of Apple Inc. (AAPL) and financial instruments, such as swap agreements and options, that provide 2X daily leveraged exposure to AAPL.
tax_status: Qualified as a regulated investment company

investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of -2 times (-200%) the daily percentage change of the common stock of Coinbase Global, Inc. Class A (NASDAQ: COIN).
principal_strategies: The Fund is an actively managed exchange traded fund that attempts to replicate -2× the inverse daily percentage change of the Underlying Stock by using derivatives such as swaps and options and rebalancing at the close of each trading day to maintain approximately -200% exposure of its net asset value.

fund_name: Defiance Daily Target 2X Long MSTR ETF
investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of two times (200%) the daily percentage change in the share price of MicroStrategy Incorporated (Nasdaq: MSTR). The Fund does not seek to achieve its stated investment objective for a period other than a single trading day.
principal_strategies: An actively managed ETF that attempts to achieve 2× the daily percentage change of MicroStrategy Incorporated’s share price primarily through swap agreements, with additional leverage provided via listed options. It holds collateral in U.S. government securities, money market funds, short‐term bond ETFs, and corporate debt, targets at least 80% exposure to instruments with economic characteristics of 2× daily performance, and rebalances daily.

investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of 2 times (200%) the daily percentage change of the common stock of NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ: NVDA).
principal_strategies: The Fund seeks to achieve its objective through financial instruments such as swaps and options on the Underlying Stock and by directly purchasing the Underlying Stock, maintaining notional exposure approximately 200% of its net asset value and rebalancing daily.

fund_name: Defiance Daily Target 2X Short PLTR ETF
investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily inverse investment results, before fees and expenses, of -2 times (-200%) the daily percentage change in the share price of Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: PLTR). The Fund does not seek to achieve its stated investment objective for a period other than a single trading day.
principal_strategies: The Fund is an actively managed exchange traded fund that employs derivatives (swap agreements and/or listed options contracts) to seek 2 times the inverse (-200%) of the daily percentage change in the price of Palantir Technologies Inc., using notional exposure and collateralized fixed income instruments and money market holdings to maintain its target.

investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of 300% of the inverse (or opposite) of the daily performance of the S&P 500® Index.
principal_strategies: Under normal circumstances, invests at least 80% of its net assets (plus borrowing for investment purposes) in financial instruments, including swap agreements, futures contracts, or short positions, that provide 3X daily inverse exposure to the S&P 500® Index or ETFs tracking the Index. The Fund also holds money market funds, deposit accounts, and short-term debt instruments.

investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to three times the inverse (-3x) of the daily performance of the Nasdaq-100® Index.
principal_strategies: The Fund invests primarily in derivatives (swap agreements and futures contracts) and holds money market instruments to seek inverse leveraged (–3×) daily investment results corresponding to the Nasdaq-100® Index.
distribution_frequency: Quarterly for income; at least annually for capital gains

investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to three times (3x) the daily performance of the Nasdaq-100® Index.
principal_strategies: The Fund invests principally by obtaining leveraged exposure through equity securities (common stock), derivatives (swap agreements and futures contracts), and money market instruments (U.S. Treasury Bills and repurchase agreements) in combination to achieve daily returns consistent with its 3x daily target, rebalancing daily.
